Trigger.Name: Twin Snakes Visual
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>[a-z-A-Z']+ [a-z-A-Z']+) gains the effect of Twin Snakes from [a-z-A-Z']+ [a-z-A-Z']+ for (?<time>\d+)

Trigger.Name: Twin Snakes Cancel
Trigger.RegularExpression: 8b0:You lose the effect of Twin Snakes.

Trigger.Name: Track duration
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>[a-z-A-Z']+ [a-z-A-Z']+) gains the effect of Twin Snakes

Trigger.Name: RoE cancled
Trigger.RegularExpression: 8b0:You lose the effect of Riddle of Earth.

Trigger.Name: Track duration
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<player>[a-z-A-Z']+ [a-z-A-Z']+) gains the effect of Riddle Of Earth

Trigger.Name: 1. Settings - Read me
Trigger.Description:
Set up the X and Y Value to position your Job-Interface.
X is horizontal Y is vertical
negative Values might be needed if you have multiple monitors - depending on your setup.
Use the following two macros for this system:
Initiate /e Toggle Icons on /e Initiate Settings
This Macro will get the Position of every Skill to display it correctly after you swap back on your job. So 1. Go on your Job you want to get the Skill-Setting from 2. activate the Macro 3. Swap to another Job 4. Swap back to the Job you want to play.
Toggle Interface /e Toggle Icons off
With this macro you deactive the Interface.

Action.TextAuraExpression: This is a placeholder to check for X and Y coordinates

Trigger.Name: Track duration
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<player>[a-z-A-Z']+ [a-z-A-Z']+) gains the effect of Arm's Length
